title: CHANGE THIS TO BE THE TITLE OF YOUR POST
text:
Code
library(tidyverse)


── Attaching core tidyverse packages ──────────────────────── tidyverse 2.0.0 ──
✔ dplyr     1.1.4     ✔ readr     2.1.5
✔ forcats   1.0.0     ✔ stringr   1.5.1
✔ ggplot2   3.5.1     ✔ tibble    3.2.1
✔ lubridate 1.9.4     ✔ tidyr     1.3.1
✔ purrr     1.0.2     
── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ──
✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter()
✖ dplyr::lag()    masks stats::lag()
ℹ Use the conflicted package (<http://conflicted.r-lib.org/>) to force all conflicts to become errors


Code
library(gt)
library(wehoop)




Code
# install.packages("gt")




Code
stats1997 <- read_csv("power_five_stats1997.csv")


Rows: 54 Columns: 11
── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Delimiter: ","
chr  (1): Team
dbl (10): W, L, ConfW, ConfL, Offppg, Defppg, SRS, SOS, AP Pre, AP Rank

ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.




Code
rankings <- stats1997 |> 
  group_by(Team) |> 
  summarise(Offppg = sum(Offppg)) |> 
  arrange(desc(Offppg)) |> 
  top_n(10, Offppg)




Code
rankings |> 
  gt() |> 
  tab_header(
    title = "Top 10 highest scoring offenses",
    subtitle = "Nebraska DOMINATED the scoring column while Michigan didn't even crack the top 10"
  ) |>
    tab_source_note(
    source_note = md("**By:** Lukas Wortmann |  **Source:** [Sports Reference](C:/Users/LukasW/OneDrive/Desktop/SPMC 350/spmc350lukas/data/logs25.csv)")
  ) |>
   tab_style(
    style = list(
      cell_fill(color = "red"),
      cell_text(color = "white")
      ),
    locations = cells_body(
      rows = Team == "Nebraska")
  )

Code
defrankings <- stats1997 |> 
  group_by(Team) |> 
  summarise(Defppg = sum(Defppg)) |> 
  arrange((Defppg)) |> 
  slice_head(n=10) |>
  gt() |> 
  tab_header(
    title = "Top 10 Teams that allowed the least points",
    subtitle = "Nebraska DOMINATED the scoring column while Michigan didn't even crack the top 10"
  ) |>
    tab_source_note(
    source_note = md("**By:** Lukas Wortmann |  **Source:** [Sports Reference](C:/Users/LukasW/OneDrive/Desktop/SPMC 350/spmc350lukas/data/logs25.csv)")
  ) |>
   tab_style(
    style = list(
      cell_fill(color = "blue"),
      cell_text(color = "white")
      ),
    locations = cells_body(
      rows = Team == "Michigan")
  )

title: About
text: Lukas Wortmann is a student at the University of Nebraska-Lincoln majoring in Sports Media
